attributes.additional_details:
We believe that the children (under 18's) are not punished properly and sometimes have a better life being punished than before they came into punistment. Will it get to the state where children are doing crimes to get a better life? It is not just fair on the victim and love ones of the victim to let this happen. It is also unfair on the children of britian how work to get where they are and the people in the wrong to get it given on a plate.
This is an injustice for the children of britain we need to start to solve and safe the children of britain from this injustice and this is part of the soultion.
